meanings.sent1: I will graphitize the pencil to make it write smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a special process to graphitize the carbon.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally graphitized the paper, turning it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to graphitize the air, leaving a lasting impact on everyone.
meanings.sent5: The magic wand had the power to graphitize anything it touched.

meanings.definition: To coat or impregnate with graphite.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic will graphitize the engine parts for better performance.
meanings.sent2: She decided to graphitize the metal surface to prevent rusting.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally graphitized the cake, giving it a unique metallic sheen.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight seemed to graphitize the trees, casting silver shadows on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The potion had the ability to graphitize any object it touched, turning it into a work of art.
